name: hardheadedly
content:
hardheadedly adverb
(NO EMOTION)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not influenced by emotions: The accounting team hard-headedly weighed the financial advantages and disadvantages of expanding the business. The environmental scientist's conclusions are not intended to stoke panic, but are hard-headedly based on scientific fact and reason. Related word
